+        # GH 14626
+        def datetime_now_without_trailing_zeros():
+            now = datetime.now()
+
+            while str(now).endswith("000"):
+                now = datetime.now()
+
+            return now
+
+        index = Index([datetime_now_without_trailing_zeros()])
